rooms.name: tavern
rooms.description: A surprisingly well-lit tavern for this region. There are a few patrons sprinkled throughout the building. To the west you see the small village's main road.

rooms.name: outside_1
rooms.description: You walk into the dingy room. You can hardly see. To the east you see a well lit tavern.

rooms.description: You walk into the dingy room. You can hardly see. To the east you see a well lit tavern.
